TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SelectingProviderEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类向事件处理程序提供值。The class supplies values to the event handler. 创建一个事件处理程序, 以便在运行时选择角色提供程序。You create a event handler to select the role provider at run time. 类在调用类的方法或方法时引发事件。 The class raises the event when either the method or the method of the class is called. 使用属性可检索有关已登录用户的信息。You use the property to retrieve information about the logged-in user. 若要通过非默认的角色提供程序检索角色信息, 请将属性设置为希望对象使用的角色提供程序的名称。To retrieve role information through a non-default role provider, set the property to the name of the role provider that you want the object to use. ## Examples 下面的示例演示事件的事件处理程序。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 事件处理程序使用对象检查用户名并设置要使用的角色提供程序。The event handler uses the object to check the user name and to set the role provider to use. 事件处理程序绑定到 global.asax 文件的`Application_Start`方法中的事件。The event handler is bound to the event in the `Application_Start` method of the Global.asax file. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.SelectingProviderEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SelectingProviderEventHandler/cs/Global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.SelectingProviderEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SelectingProviderEventHandler/vb/Global.asax#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ProviderName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ProviderName : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置用于检索用户角色的角色提供程序。

span.span: Gets or sets the role provider to use for retrieving the user's roles.

value.span: 用于获取用户角色的角色提供程序的名称。

span.span: The name of the role provider that is used to get the user's roles.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 事件期间使用属性设置角色提供程序。You use the property to set the role provider during the event. ## Examples 下面的示例演示事件的事件处理程序。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 事件处理程序使用对象检查用户名并设置要使用的角色提供程序。The event handler uses the object to check the user name and to set the role provider to use. 事件处理程序绑定到 global.asax 文件的`Application_Start`方法中的事件。The event handler is bound to the event in the `Application_Start` method of the Global.asax file. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.SelectingProviderEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SelectingProviderEventHandler/cs/Global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.SelectingProviderEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SelectingProviderEventHandler/vb/Global.asax#1)]

summary.span: 获取已经过身份验证的用户。

value.span: 包含已经过身份验证的用户的对象。

span.span: An object that contains the authenticated user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可以在事件期间检索有关用户的信息。You use the property to retrieve information about the user during the event. ## Examples 下面的示例演示事件的事件处理程序。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 事件处理程序使用对象检查用户名并设置要使用的角色提供程序。The event handler uses the object to check the user name and set the role provider to use. 事件处理程序绑定到 global.asax 文件的`Application_Start`方法中的事件。The event handler is bound to the event in the `Application_Start` method of the Global.asax file.
